attributes.action: Reduce prices of insurance policies as they are non-affordable for youngsters!
attributes.additional_details: I have to risk my like on a motorbike to my apprenticeship (My education, my place of work, my place to earn money to afford keep things running) EVERY DAY (30 miles a day) In the cold, rain, ice. All because I can't afford a safer way to my place of work, and i'm sure I am not the only one, this is disgusting how our country is allowed to rip off youngsters, not all of us youngsters are a risk on the road, motorbike riders are more aware and so I am less of a risk but still get ripped off more.
attributes.background: Insurance prices are still sky high price, and the previous petitions obviously didn't do anything about it. America flips if the prices get bad (like 1 US Dollar for fuel per liter) so why should we let our companies get away with this rip off scam. Gender discrimination is also still happening.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on insurance companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
